fastq dir: /pipeline/Runs/NextSeq/220511_NB501056_0799_AH335YBGXM/ProjectFolders/Project_Christina-Sparbier/

# set up project dir and run alignment pipeline
```{bash}
mkdir alignment
mkdir logs
mkdir scripts

cd alignment

for fq in /pipeline/Runs/NextSeq/220511_NB501056_0799_AH335YBGXM/ProjectFolders/Project_Christina-Sparbier/*/*fastq.gz
do
sbatch ../scripts/Bowtie_align.sbatch $fq
done
```

# make BWs and heatmaps at bivalent genes
```{bash}
mkdir RPGCNormBW
mkdir UnnormBW

for bam in *sort.rmdup.bam
do
sbatch ../scripts/DeeptoolsBamCov.sbatch $bam
done

cd RPGCNormBW

sbatch ../../scripts/DeeptoolsBWMatrix.sbatch
```

# run macs to get bdg output for Spark
```{bash}
# input is control for SINGLE samples and K27 is input for both
sbatch scripts/macs2.sbatch alignment/MHC-ReChIP2-K562-SINGLE-H3K27me3_S3.sort.rmdup.bam alignment/MHC-ReChIP2-K562-INPUT_S1.sort.rmdup.bam
sbatch scripts/macs2.sbatch alignment/MHC-ReChIP2-K562-SINGLE-H3K4me3_S2.sort.rmdup.bam alignment/MHC-ReChIP2-K562-INPUT_S1.sort.rmdup.bam
sbatch scripts/macs2.sbatch alignment/MHC-ReChIP2-K562-ReChIP-with-clear-H3K4me3_S5.sort.rmdup.bam alignment/MHC-ReChIP2-K562-SINGLE-H3K27me3_S3.sort.rmdup.bam
```
